title: Montpelier teen hit in turkey hunting accident
content:
MORETOWN, Vt. -
Vermont State police say a Montpelier teen was shot while turkey hunting.
The incident happened in Moretown around 6 a.m. Sunday. Officials say 16-year-old Cheyanne Green was hunting from a ground blind on the edge of a field when she was hit by several shotgun pellets. Police say 48-year-old Peter Noack was also in the area hunting with his son. Police say the Waitsfield man fired his weapon not knowing Green was nearby. Police say Green suffered very minor injuries which did not require medical treatment. The incident remains under investigation.
